title: manamE iniyEnum
sahitya:
manamE iniyEnum nI anudinamum muruganai ninaindu varuvAi enil nalam anaittum peruvAi


anupallavi

  vinai Edum unai aDuttu unadu nilaiyaik-kulaittu viDuvadait-taDukkum vElan aruL kiDaikkum


caraNam    tuNai peTriDat-tannai aNugi vandaDaindu iNaiyaDi tanaip-paTri iDar Atru vAzhavE
vaNangiDum aDiyArai aNaittu aruL puriya iNangum iNaiyillA tuNaivan avan enrE
